refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The X509 ASN1 allocation routines, allocate and free an X509 structure, which represents an X509 certificate.
X509_new() allocates and initializes a X509 structure.
X509_free() frees up the X509 structure a.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: If the allocation fails, X509_new() returns NULL and sets an error code that can be obtained by ERR_get_error(3). Otherwise it returns a pointer to the newly allocated structure.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: X509_new() and X509_free() are available in all versions of SSLeay and OpenSSL.
